translation: For the protection of the good, for the destruction of the wicked, and for the establishment of righteousness, I am born in every age.
commentary: 4.8 Salvation for the protection? of the good of the saints? Vinashaya for the destruction? f and? duṣkṛtām of the wicked? for the establishment of righteousness? Sambhavami (I) am born?
